activities.name: Eiffel Tower Visit
activities.description: Ascend the iconic iron lattice tower for panoramic views of Paris from the observation decks.
activities.tips: Book skip-the-line tickets online to avoid long queues.

activities.name: Louvre Museum Tour
activities.description: Explore the world's largest art museum, home to the Mona Lisa and countless masterpieces.
activities.tips: Start with the must-see works to avoid crowd fatigue.

activities.name: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Glide along the Seine and see Paris's landmarks from a unique waterside perspective.
activities.tips: Evening cruises offer stunning views of illuminated monuments.

activities.name: Shibuya Crossing Experience
activities.description: Witness the world's busiest pedestrian crossing in the heart of Tokyo.
activities.tips: View from Starbucks at Tsutaya for the best perspective.

activities.name: Senso-ji Temple Visit
activities.description: Explore Tokyo's oldest temple, a stunning Buddhist shrine in Asakusa.
activities.tips: Arrive early to avoid crowds and explore Nakamise Shopping Street.

activities.name: Tsukiji Outer Market Food Tour
activities.description: Sample the freshest sushi and Japanese street food at the famous fish market area.
activities.tips: Go before 11am for the best selection and freshest items.

activities.name: Statue of Liberty Tour
activities.description: Visit America's iconic symbol of freedom on Liberty Island.
activities.tips: Reserve crown access tickets months in advance.

activities.name: Central Park Bike Tour
activities.description: Cycle through 840 acres of New York's beloved urban oasis.
activities.tips: Spring and fall offer the best weather and scenery.

activities.name: Broadway Show
activities.description: Experience world-class theater in the heart of Times Square.
activities.tips: Check TKTS booth for same-day discounted tickets.

activities.name: Sagrada Família Tour
activities.description: Marvel at Gaudí's unfinished masterpiece, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
activities.tips: Book tickets online to skip the hours-long queues.

activities.name: La Boqueria Food Market
activities.description: Explore Barcelona's famous food market with fresh produce, tapas, and local delicacies.
activities.tips: Visit mid-morning on weekdays to avoid tourist crowds.

activities.name: Ubud Rice Terrace Trek
activities.description: Hike through Bali's stunning emerald rice paddies with a local guide.
activities.tips: Wear comfortable shoes and bring plenty of water.

activities.name: Uluwatu Temple Sunset
activities.description: Watch a traditional Kecak fire dance at this clifftop temple at sunset.
activities.tips: Arrive early for good seats at the dance performance.

activities.name: Burj Khalifa Observation Deck
activities.description: Ascend to the world's tallest building for breathtaking views of Dubai.
activities.tips: Book sunset slots for the most spectacular views.

activities.name: Desert Safari Adventure
activities.description: Experience dune bashing, camel rides, and a Bedouin camp dinner under the stars.
activities.tips: Bring a light jacket as desert nights can be cool.

activities.name: Colosseum Guided Tour
activities.description: Step back in time at ancient Rome's most iconic amphitheater.
activities.tips: Combined tickets include Roman Forum and Palatine Hill.

activities.name: Vatican Museums & Sistine Chapel
activities.description: Explore one of the world's greatest art collections and Michelangelo's masterpiece ceiling.
activities.tips: Book early entry to beat the crowds.

activities.name: Sydney Opera House Tour
activities.description: Go behind the scenes of Australia's most famous building.
activities.tips: Combine with a performance for the full experience.

activities.name: Bondi to Coogee Coastal Walk
activities.description: Walk the stunning 6km coastal trail along Sydney's beautiful eastern beaches.
activities.tips: Start early for smaller crowds and better parking.

activities.name: Tower of London Tour
activities.description: Explore 1000 years of royal history and see the Crown Jewels.
activities.tips: Join a Yeoman Warder tour for fascinating stories.
